Brief Description: Set parameters for image presentation experiments, including the paths of the images to be presented.
Set parameters for movie presentation experiments, including the paths of the movies to be presented.
Set parameters for visuotopic or retinorotpic mapping (fMRI) experiments using either classic or population receptive field stimuli.
Set parameters for saccade mapping experiments using visually or memory-guided saccades.
Set parameters for auditory stimulus presentation experiments.
